Anthony Braxton’s Composition No. 19 (For 100 Tubas)

Anthony Braxton is an American experime ntal composer\, educator\, music theorist\, improviser and multi-instrumen talist who is best known for playing saxophones\, particularly the alto.

Composed in the early 1970s\, Braxton’s Composition No. 19 i s a processional performance for 100 Tubas – FREE in Fort Greene Park!

The performance will start on the “west lawn” at Ft Greene park\, which is west of the tennis courts.
